1: @@//pa'i don <mistake>dang/ sku</mistake> dang gsungs dang thugs kyi gsang <mistake>pa</mistake> yongs su dag pa'i phyir <mistake>dang/ yongs</mistake> su ma rdzogs pa <mistake>dang/ yongs</mistake> su <mistake>m</mistake> dag <mistake>ba'i</mistake> sa dang pha rol tu phyin pa dang bsod nams
2: dang ye shes kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs pa <mistake>dang/ yongs</mistake> su dag pa'i phyir <mistake>dang / zla</mistake> na med pa'i don lhag par ma rtogs pa lhag par rtogs pa'i phyir <mistake>dang/ ma</mistake> thob pa thob pa'i phyir <mistake>dang/ ji</mistake> srid de
3: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i <mistake>cos</mistake> kyi tshul yang dag par gzung ba'i don du yang bdag gis bstan pa <mistake>dang/yang</mistake> dag par rab tu bshad pa <mistake>dang/ rnam</mistake> par bkrol ba <mistake>dang/rnam</mistake> par
4: phye ba <mistake>dang/rab</mistake> tu gsal <mistake>bar</mistake> byas pa <mistake>dang/byin</mistake> gyis brlabs <mistake>pa'o//lag</mistake> na rdo rje <mistake>do</mistake> rje <mistake>'chang/'di</mistake> ni <mistake>nges</mistake> khyod kyi rgyud la sngags kyi chos nyid thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyis
5: brlabs <mistake>pa'o //'di</mistake> ni 'khor lo dang <mistake>po'i</mistake> rjes su <mistake>bsngs</mistake> pa bcu gcig <mistake>go///gzhan</mistake> yang <mistake>lag</mistake> na rdo rje rdo rje <mistake>'chang/mtshan</mistake> yang <mistake>dag</mistake> par brjod pa 'di <mistake>n</mistake> shin tu yongs su dag <mistake>pa/ yongs</mistake> su
6: byang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang bar gyur pa'o // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi byang chub <mistake>po//yang</mistake> dag par <mistake>rdzogs</mistake> pa'i sangs
7: rgyas rnams kyi mngon par rtogs <mistake>pa'o// de</mistake> <mistake>bzhini</mistake> gshegs pa thams cad kyi bla na med <mistake>pa'o //bde</mistake> bar gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rtogs <mistake>pa'o// rgyal</mistake> ba rnams kyi bdud kyi <mistake>stebs</mistake>
8: thams cad pham <mistake>par</mistake> byed <mistake>pa'o //stobs</mistake> bcu dang ldan pa thams cad kyi stobs <mistake>bcu'i</mistake> stobs su gyur <mistake>pa'o//thams</mistake> cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnams kyi thams cad <mistake>makhyen</mistake> <mistake>pa'o//chos</mistake> thams <mistake>cand</mistake>
